attributes.additional_details:
After several articles about an online mock referendum for the City of Donetsk to become part of the United Kingdom, we petition to increase ties with the City of Donetsk in Ukraine and to formally promote United Kingdom's interests by introducing this City and it's region to become part of the United Kingdom as it was founded by a fellow countryman born in Wales.

It is in the interest of the Government to help protect and keep the peace in this City and it should help and assist the Ukrainian Government to offer their people a referendum to choose their future by giving them a chance to become part of the UK.
